public class MongoGamesDatabase
extends Object

public MongoGamesDatabase(String mongoHostAddress,
                          int mongoPort,
                          String databaseName)
Basic Constructor for a MongoGameDatabase Object.

Parameters:
mongoHostAddress - The hostAddress where the mongoDB server is running
mongoPort - The port to connect to MongoDB
databaseName - The database name we want to work with.
